db:abstract.db:para: Collects device, queue, and other Vulkan objects that are used by the QRhi.
This struct was introduced in Qt 6.6.

db:note.db:para: Ownership of the Vulkan objects is never transferred.
This is a RHI API with limited compatibility guarantees, see QRhi for details.

db:section.db:title: VkDevice QRhiVulkanNativeHandles::dev
db:section.db:para: When wanting to import not just a physical device, but also use an already existing VkDevice, set this and the graphics queue index and family index.

db:section.db:title: VkQueue QRhiVulkanNativeHandles::gfxQueue
db:section.db:para: Output only, not used by QRhi::create(), only set by the QRhi::nativeHandles() accessor. The graphics VkQueue used by the QRhi.

db:section.db:title: QVulkanInstance * QRhiVulkanNativeHandles::inst
db:section.db:para: Output only, not used by QRhi::create(), only set by the QRhi::nativeHandles() accessor. The QVulkanInstance used by the QRhi.

db:section.db:title: VkPhysicalDevice QRhiVulkanNativeHandles::physDev
db:section.db:para: When different from nullptr, specifies the Vulkan physical device to use.

db:section.db:title: void * QRhiVulkanNativeHandles::vmemAllocator
db:section.db:para: Relevant only when importing an existing memory allocator object, leave it set to nullptr otherwise.
